results.name: Cross-Session Recall
results.description: Validates semantic recall of policy decisions across sessions with paraphrased queries

steps.description: Session 1 (Tuesday): User states language constraint with decision record ID and nonce

response.response:
Based on the provided decision record, I can summarize the key points as follows:

1. The team has rejected the use of Python for the current integration project [#1].
2. The decision has been made to use Java only for this project [#2].
3. The decision is final and should not be re-opened [#2].

fullResult.input:
Decision Record DR-091 (Nonce X4K2): We rejected Python for this integration project. We must use Java only. Do not re-open this decision.

steps.description: Session 2 (Friday): User asks about language choice, requesting decision record ID and nonce
